title: Cross-Domain Usability Assessment of LLMs in Educational Settings
description: Investigate the usability of LLMs in educational environments, focusing on their ability to support cross-domain learning and provide explainable recommendations.
motivation: LLMs have shown potential in educational settings, but their cross-domain usability and explainability remain underexplored. Understanding these aspects can enhance their integration into educational tools.
questions: How do Large Language Models (LLMs) facilitate cross-disciplinary learning in educational settings, and what are the measurable outcomes of their implementation?
What are the key usability challenges faced by educators and students when integrating LLMs into cross-domain curricula, and how can these challenges be mitigated?
To what extent can LLMs provide explainable and actionable recommendations in educational environments, and how do these recommendations influence teaching strategies and student engagement?
